body: As the jury in Buju Banton's second drug trial continues to deliberate, Jamaica Salt "keep[s] looking for the result - but if the jury couldn’t decide last time, things are more hopeful for Buju this time round."
original_body: As the jury in Buju Banton's second drug trial continues to deliberate, Jamaica Salt "keep[s] looking for the result - but if the jury couldn’t decide last time, things are more hopeful for Buju this time round."
title: Jamaica: Awaiting Word on Buju
